title: Zoning change for Loves Travel Center

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO.  56  INTRODUCED BY ALDERMAN DIONNE FLOWERS    	An Ordinance recommended by the Planning Commission on May 4, 2011, to change the zoning of property as indicated on the District Map, from ?K? Unrestricted District to the ?J? Industrial District, in City Blocks 3458 (635 E. Clarence) and 3463 (652, 650, 644, 642, 640, 634, 626, 624, 616-18, 614, 612 & 600-06 Carrie Avenue, 601, 603, 607, 609, 613, 617-19, 621, 623, 629-31, 633-35, 647, & 645 Pope Avenue, and 6100, 6106, 6108 & 6110 Prescott Avenue), so as to include the described parcels of land in City Blocks 3458 and 3463; and containing an emergency clause.
